name: Politics Matters
membership: Member of the Spanish Chamber of Commerce
goal:
Politics Matters is an independent, boutique, government affairs firm in Brussels, Belgium. With an emphasis on face-to-face communication and personal outreach to decision makers, Politics Matters brings traditional “shoe-leather” advocacy and delivers results to clients in many practice areas.

Politics Matters helps to identify political risks and opportunities for your business and to develop strategies to meet these challenges. We navigate you through this dynamic political process at national, European and international level. And we aim to build solid relationships that make win-win outcomes for all stakeholders involved.
interests: Agriculture, Borders and Security, Competition, Digital economy and society, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, Public Health, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Politics Matters monitors and engages on the following key EU policy themes: Security & Defence; Civil Protection mechanism; Health & Food policies in general and Health Security in particular; Disruptive Innovation Technologies; Mobility & Transport; Energy Efficiency; Aviation and EASA Regulation.
